title: Drawing, "Plan, J.P Morgan Library Museum, New York", ca. 1900
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and blue and yellow watercolor, red and green crayon, on tracing paper mounted on white laid paper
inscribed:
Below image, in ink:  Sketch plan for library Museum
Lower left: For J. P. Morgan Esq.
Lower right: Scale
description: Floor plan of the Library Museum at top flanked by exedrae and gardens; vestibule, center, flanked by studies and gardens; entrance and steps at bottom; scale, lower right.  Edges pasted to a backing sheet of paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Plan, J.P Morgan Library Museum, New York", ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and blue and yellow watercolor, red and green crayon, on tracing paper mounted on white laid paper. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-334.
